description: This file defines external API prototypes for the Daemon Socket UDP Object in the ANSC framework, including creation, removal, object enrollment, and initialization functions.

methods.name: AnscCreateDaemonSocketUdp
methods.description: Creates a UDP daemon socket object with specified container, owner, and reserved contexts.

methods.name: AnscDkuoCreate
methods.description: Creates a new Daemon Socket UDP Object with specified contexts.

methods.name: AnscDkuoRemove
methods.description: Removes the specified Daemon Socket UDP Object.

methods.name: AnscDkuoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls necessary objects into the Daemon Socket UDP Object.

methods.name: AnscDkuoInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the Daemon Socket UDP Object.
